lyrics:
Get Dancinâ€™ Lyrics[Prelude]
(Here he comes)
(Disco Tex and the Sex-O-Lettes!)

[Intro]
Doo doo doo, doo doo doo
Doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo
Doo doo doo, doo doo doo
Doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo
Doo doo doo, doo doo doo
Doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo
Doo doo doo, doo doo doo
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Chorus]
Da doo dot dee dot dot dey
Doot-dot, doot-dot, doo da da
Get dancin', dancin', dance
Da doo dot dee dot dot dey
Doot-dot, doot-dot, doo da da
Get dancin', dancin', dance
[Verse]
Here comes D.J. Disco Tex
Truckin' with his Sex-O-Lettes
Get dancin', dancin', dance
Guaranteed to rock the boat
Machine gun rap and locomote
Get dancin', dancin', dance

[Alt. Chorus]
(Dancin')
(Get dancin')
(Dancin')
(Get dancin')
(Rock!)

[Interlude 1]
(Oh, yeah)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
